name: Jsr354-api
body:
### Welcome to JSR 354 (API)
This project represents the source code modelling the API for JSR 354 Money & Currency:
Typically you will never work with this API standalone, instead of you would use an implementation dependency. Neverhtless this API is accessible by configuring the macen dependency:
```
<dependency>
  <groupId>javax.money</groupId>
  <artifactId>jsr354-api</artifactId>
  <version>0.7</version>
</dependency>
```

### Further information
For further information we recommend reading the specification document, located here (tbd)...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
